'''Nilotpala Cup Tournament Stage''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

One copy of Nilotpala Cup Tournament Stage can be purchased from the event shop during the [[Fabulous Fungus Frenzy]] Event.
